title: Pixel phone notification dot question
content: When I go under settings >notifications on my pixel phone.... then I go into whatsapp......and I select to ONLY have "show notifications" button ON and "show notifications dot" ON, will I see the dot as my only notification alert? I do not want to see any notifications in my shelf, no pop ups, or on lock screen....I only want to see notification dot on app icon. Please advise.
